Ragnar eases off.

Ragnar: Neither did I, Aerotaur. One thing is certain, we need power 
to maintain this base, quiaff? Even robots such as you have to go 
under some maintenance, quiaff?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>        He shrugs off the reprimand.  "I have seen none.  That is all 
I know." 
>  He folds his arms across his chest to punctuate his statement.  
"Perhaps you 
> know better than I."
